channel.title: Making a server run through silab?
channel.description: what i mean is... how do i make my server run on silab? is it a certain source? still need help here!!!

item.title: Making a server run through silab?
item.dc:creator: @cheese8 cheese8
item.description:
@cheese8 wrote:

oooh… thats why im getting odd items thanks

ok… i found a mithril defender… but if i try to pick it up… i just lag out? and when i try to use ::pickup it just says wrong syntax… i dont know how to fix it

i can see defenders on the ground… and even wear them, but i just cant have them in my inventory??

Read full topic
item.source: Making a server run through silab?

item.title: Making a server run through silab?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

cheese8:

i know but would my server have all the silab items in it? e.g. skill capes? i have an older server and i dont know if silab requires a certain source.

They would work, the only thing is you would have to edit your pickup command to register that is has to pick up item’s over 20000. I’ll leave you to do that. One of the problem’s will be that the capes and other items will wield in the weapon’s spot. Edit it in Item.java, and again, I’ll leave you to do that.

Read full topic
